snippet: Planning for the New York-area Super Bowl in 2014 remains in its earliest stages, but Al Kelly, chief executive of the host committee, visited Indianapolis for a fact-finding tour.
abstract: Planning for the New York-area Super Bowl in 2014 remains in its earliest stages, but Al Kelly, chief executive of the host committee, visited Indianapolis for a fact-finding tour.
lead_paragraph: Planning for the New York-area Super Bowl in 2014 remains in its earliest stages, but Al Kelly, chief executive of the host committee, visited Indianapolis for a fact-finding tour.

headline.seo: Studying What Might Work When Super Bowl Comes to New York
headline.main: Diving Into the Details for When the Super Bowl Comes to New York
